abstract: Lilia Luciano, the correspondent on a “Today” segment that presented a misleading edit of an audio clip related to the Trayvon Martin shooting, is no longer employed at the network.
snippet: Lilia Luciano, the correspondent on a “Today” segment that presented a misleading edit of an audio clip related to the Trayvon Martin shooting, is no longer employed at the network.
lead_paragraph: 7:04 p.m. | Updated Lilia Luciano, a correspondent who was involved in a misleading news report about Trayvon Martin and George Zimmerman in March, is no longer employed by NBC News, the network confirmed on Thursday.

headline.main: Correspondent Involved in Misleading ‘Today’ Segment Leaves NBC News
